div.p: The Board of Education and staff at ISD #2184 are striving for excellence each day in the areas of academics, arts, and athletics. The District takes great pride in our history of excellence and values the many educational opportunities that enrich the lives of our students.
Click here to read more from Superintendent Oftedahl.
